title: AZ Quotes Scraper
description: Extract inspirational quotes from AZ Quotes. Search by author letter, specific author name, or topic. Scraper efficiently collects quotes with author information, tags, and popularity metrics.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Multiple AZ Quotes URLs to scrape. Enter URLs separated by newlines or commas.

authorLetter.title: Author Letter Filter
authorLetter.description: Filter authors by first letter (A-Z). For example, 'a' will scrape authors starting with 'A'. Leave empty to browse all authors.

searchAuthor.title: Search Author Name
searchAuthor.description: Search for a specific author by name (e.g., 'Albert Einstein', 'Maya Angelou'). The scraper will find matching author pages.

topic.title: Quote Topic
topic.description: Filter quotes by topic/category (e.g., 'inspirational', 'love', 'life', 'success', 'wisdom'). Leave empty to scrape by author instead.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Number of Quotes
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of quotes to collect. The scraper will stop after reaching this limit.

max_pages.title: Maximum Number of Pages
max_pages.description: Safety limit on the number of pages to visit per author or topic. Prevents excessive crawling.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Configure proxy settings. Recommended to use Apify Proxy (residential or datacenter) to avoid rate limiting.
